roleset.name: event where smoking occurs

example.name: With temporal, quitting!
example.text: Her son hasn't had a smoke in six months.

example.name: With arg1 as "of" prep
example.text: We had a smoke of somebody's pinched tobacco.

example.name: drinking and smoking, there was probably some rock and roll
example.src: drinking and smoking, there was probably some rock and roll
example.type: drinking and smoking, there was probably some rock and roll
example.text: If I hadn't have had anything to drink the other night, I most probably wouldn't have had a smoke of that cigarette.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry smoke.01, OntoNotes sense grouping smoke.05; maps to VN class entity_specific_modes_being-47.2. Framed by Claire
